arts.sum: In a thrilling encounter marked by local rivalry, Venezia and Hellas Verona played to a 1-1 draw in the Veneto Derby, leaving both teams struggling in the bottom four of Serie A. arts.ttl: Venezia vs. Hellas Verona: a relegation six-pointer
arts.sum: Hellas Verona (47) have conceded 45+ goals after 21 matches of a season for the first time in Serie A. Hellas Verona (22) and Venezia (14) are the two teams to have conceded the most goals in the first 30 minutes of play in Serie A this season.
